body_html: Our CI needs to upgrade bazel, and then we need to bump the version of the check_version required bazel before we can accept this. It would be nice if the check_version went in with this PR.
body_text: Our CI needs to upgrade bazel, and then we need to bump the version of the check_version required bazel before we can accept this.  It would be nice if the check_version went in with this PR.
